news.title: WEBP/JPG sRGB HD
news.newscomment: Conversion of all art pieces into JPG is finished. Resolutions increased to 2K. Color Profiles adapted to sRGB.

news.title: AutoFister
news.newscomment: Gallery Automatta. Remembers and load the last gallery preference. No more extra clicks or code inputs. Seamless and smooth experience as intended.

news.title: Cr.H Protocols
news.newscomment: Data security and handling has been improved.

news.title: WEBP/JPG
news.newscomment: WEBP/JPG Switcher introduced, it loads from 2 different image hosts in case if one goes down (happened before). Conversion of all art pieces into JPG will take some time tho.

news.title: Zoom feature
news.newscomment: Added scroll wheel Zoom feature when in Pan mode.

news.title: Thumbs Page and Particles tweak
news.newscomment: The Thumbs Page now loads the maximum thumb size available from YT servers. Particles effects are now dynamic and based on current month/season (snow, fire, dust, etc).

news.title: YouTube Thumbs Page
news.newscomment: A new YouTube Thumbnails Page has been added into Service.

news.title: Botan lay set
news.newscomment: A full colored illustrations set of Botan laying on her side has been finished and added to all Galleries. Linearts updated as well.

news.title: Stream Server QOL
news.newscomment: Stream page is now remembers your chosen server settings for future sessions. Number of multi-streams increased from 4 to 6.

news.title: Fullscreen and Download
news.newscomment: Two new buttons Fullscreen and Download added to the gallery's viewer.

news.title: Botan with RPG Colored
news.newscomment: All 3 versions of 'Botan with RPG' has been colored and added to all Galleries.

news.title: Botan lay lineart
news.newscomment: A lineart set of Botan laying on her side has been finished and added to all Galleries.

news.title: Codework More
news.newscomment: Thousands of code fixes across all pages. Calendar wheel control is now precise. Manual added to Timer. Touchscreen and Mouse drag features added to Gallery, + new buttons for Zoom and Pan.

news.title: Codework
news.newscomment: Hundreds of code optimizations and cleaning across all pages, some new graphics added.

news.title: Galleries Boost
news.newscomment: Gallery Art loading reduced x2 times due to the newest formats/procedures. So the overall loading speed boost is now 2169% faster which is just ridiculous.

news.title: Botan with RPG Lineart Full Set
news.newscomment: A Full Set of Botan RPG's Lineart has been finished and added to all Galleries.

news.title: Gallery Fixes
news.newscomment: Gallery's minor bugs fixes, Code optimization for slide buttons and lineart filters.

news.title: Botan with RPG Lineart
news.newscomment: Lineart from live stream published without delay to R18 Gallery.

news.title: Marisa & Hannah Art
news.newscomment: Marisa (fanart 2023) & Hannah (OC, 2024) Illustrations has been polished and added to the R18/F18 galleries.

news.title: IRyS Art
news.newscomment: IRyS Illustrations full set has been finished and added to the R18-gallery.

news.title: Princess Art
news.newscomment: A full set of Princess Illustrations is finally finished and added to the galleries.

news.title: Gallery improvements
news.newscomment: Gallery artworks and thumbnails loading speed increased by 400%. Various minor bugs fixed.

news.title: Kaela Art
news.newscomment: Illustrations set of Kaela has been finished and added to all S/R18/F18 galleries.

news.title: News Added
news.newscomment: The News Page created. Code optimizations across other pages.

news.title: Stream Page Finished
news.newscomment: Stream Page is fully developed, Filters added, everything works perfectly.

news.title: Multi-Streams added
news.newscomment: Now it's possible to watch up to 4 streams at the same time. Massive life quality improvement.

news.title: Help Feature added
news.newscomment: Added manual for Stream Page.

news.title: Images Optimization
news.newscomment: Art, thumbnails and web graphic are now loading 700% faster.

news.title: Some Art
news.newscomment: A bunch of my color illustrations published: Fubuki 4k, Princess, Kaela & Hajime, Lwd (oc). Lineart: Marisa, Bunny Heart, Axcel, Ankha, Kanata.

news.title: Gallery improved farther
news.newscomment: Massive work has been done. Gallery now has all necessary tech and should work perfectly across all devices.

news.title: Fonts added
news.newscomment: Website is now using multiple fancy looking graffiti and inking style fonts.

news.title: Calendar Page
news.newscomment: A new Calendar Page has been added. It has a week disk calculator for mid and long term planning.

news.title: Website Deployed
news.newscomment: First ever deployment of stable prototype. Website is now Public and has Gallery and Timer Pages to offer.

news.title: Working prototype
news.newscomment: Website created locally with basic design and functions.

news.title: Early prototype
news.newscomment: The early development of this very website made in basic HTML/CSS stored at local drive.
